nodes.text: This discussion is kind of unrelated to abortion because a link between abortion being wrong and someone not helping another in need doesn't exist.  If you believe thief is wrong you don't have to become a police officer to show this. To answer your question...who knows, identifying the true problem is the start.

No one mentioned helping or not helping people here, or even dealing with the consquences of pregnancy at all. Its more; 'If abortion were banned, what measures or research would you suggest to reduce the pressure for people to have illegal ones or unwanted pregnancies'.
